Variant Name: Verona - 36 inch Ultima Midnight Collection Freestanding Induction Range with 5 Elements, 5 cu. ft. Oven Capacity, Touch Control Clock in Matte Black (Ultima Midnight / Range / Black) - VMFSIE365EE
Variant HTML:
Elegance and functionality meet in the 36-inch Verona Ultima Midnight Collection Induction Range. Stylish details include an angled stainless-steel handle and digital clock and timer. The cooktop has 5 induction elements, 2 of which can be used as bridges, and the 5-cu. ft. oven has dual convection fans to ensure even heating.

Kitchen Appliances:

  • Five Areas of Induction
  • Both sides of the Smart Zone can be bridged, and it has a power boost of 3700W and a measurement of 4.5" when not connected and 9.75" when connected.
  • The inner zone is 5" and the dual zone is 9 7/8"; the power boost ratings are 3000/5500W and 1850/2600W, respectively.
  • Glass and ceramic cooktop surface in black
  • Cast-Iron Griddle Inclusive


Kitchen Appliances:

  • A 5.0 cu. ft. (30"W x 16"D x 15.5"H) cube
  • Two-Fan Convection System
  • Convection in Europe
  • Full-Width Broiler Element with Closed Door
  • Power for 3,000W Broiler
  • A variety of cooking modes are available, including: baking, broiling, defrosting, pizza, fan assist, and convection baking.
  • Three-Pane Removable Glass Oven Door with Soft-Close Mechanism
  • (4) Light-Emitting Diode Obstruction Ovens
  • Catalytic panels inside + Easy-clean enamel exterior
  • 1-regular rack with adjustable positions
  • 2 - maintain a stationary position while gliding
  • 1-shelf that saves space
  • 1-tray for air-frying
  • 1. Assembling the broiler pan


Extra Functions:

  • Control via Touch and Timer Programmability
  • Handle Made of Anangled Stainless Steel
  • Control Knobs—Round and Soft-Touch Chrome
  • Wide-Bottom Drawer for Organizing
  • dedicated circuit with 120/240 volts, 60 Hz, and 50 amps
  • coverage for parts and labor for two years


Freight Charges May Apply

Features

  • Drawer with Full Width for Storage
    • Makes it easy to store cookware, which helps to keep your kitchen organized and free of clutter.
  • Hands-Free Clock
    • The touch control clock makes perfect timing in the kitchen a breeze with its easy-to-read display and straightforward interface.
  • Dual Convection Fans for European Convection
    • With two convection fans, you can cook food more quickly and evenly every time. This is because the heat is distributed evenly throughout the oven.
  • Rinse-Free Enamel
    • Cleaning is a breeze thanks to the smooth enamel interior.
  • Griddle and Five Induction Zones
    • A griddle and five induction zones allow for precise and efficient cooking.
  • Oven Capacity: 5 Cu. Ft.
    • You can bake, roast, or broil large meals in the roomy oven.
  • Smooth-Touch Round Knob
    • The ergonomically shaped, round soft-touch knob makes adjusting the settings a breeze.
